channel.title: yasu on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in yasu on Barefoot Rob

item.title: lessons at SCC
item.description: 17:29 Thursday 21 February 2019 JST Today (and most Thursdays) I taught at SCC in Kawasaki. Naoko reviewed for her test next week. Yasu reviewed the same material for his test sometime in the future. Azusa did much better with her fluency and intonation for her presentation. Liliko asked about the brochure that has to change soon to accomodate new opening times. After the lessons I went to say HI to Tomoko and Midori, but Midori had the day off.
